titles.title: Energy Star Homes Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit to homeowners for Energy Star qualified homes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/2/2006--Introduced. Energy Star Homes Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow homeowners a $10,000 tax credit for the purchase of an energy star qualified home (a home meeting certain energy saving requirements established by the Environmental Protection Agency). Terminates such credit after 2008.
